miniapp.name: Sway
miniapp.subtitle: Keep the dot in balance.
miniapp.description: Sway is a tiny balance game where you tilt your phone to keep a glowing dot inside a shifting safe zone, perfect for 10-second breaks.
miniapp.ogDescription: Sway is a tiny balance game where you tilt your phone to keep a glowing dot inside a shifting safe zone, perfect for 10-second breaks.
